errors.reasoning: Author has 0% merge rate across 2 prior PRs (negative signal per P-2-4), but has received approval from a non-maintainer reviewer (drkraft) with strong technical endorsement. The reviewer is affected by the bug and validates the fix addresses a real pain point. Size is XS (3 files), scope is focused. Greptile review present. While 0% prior merge rate is a strong negative signal, the approval from a domain expert (user-affected reviewer) who explicitly validated the fix provides sufficient positive engagement to predict merge at 0.72 confidence. Per P-2-4, non-maintainer approval alone is insufficient for 0% merge-rate authors, but the affected-user validation is a mitigating factor.

First-time contributor with approval from yofabr (CONTRIBUTOR). Medium scope (10 files) focused on Signal channel feature. Greptile review present. No maintainer label, but approval signal + focused scope + no negative signals suggest merge.

Author jessy2027 has 0% merge rate (3 prior PRs, 0 merged). High comment count (13) but all are self-advocacy: author pinging greptile-apps repeatedly and referencing PR #4841. Per Pattern P-5-9, first-time contributors with high comment engagement but no human reviewer approval have low merge probability. No human reviewer approval present, only automated greptile reviews. Medium-sized PR (M label, 9 files) from 0% merge-rate author with self-advocacy comments and no maintainer label. Multiple greptile reviews indicate some engagement, but no human approval.

First-time contributor (0 prior PRs) with M-sized feature PR (5 files, touches multiple components: gateway, agents, web-ui). No human reviewer approval or engagement (only automated Greptile review, which has not approved). Per P-2-3, medium-sized feature PRs from first-time contributors without maintainer approval or label do not reliably merge even with community discussion. This PR has zero comments (no community discussion) and zero human reviews. Combination of first-time contributor status, medium scope, no human engagement, and no maintainer label predicts non-merge.

Author mbelinky (0% merge rate, 3 prior PRs) with has_maintainer_label=true. Maintainer label has 90.7% merge rate signal (183 PRs). Medium scope (10 files), touches extensions (device-pair plugin). Greptile review present. No explicit negative signals. Maintainer label is a strong positive override signal per feature guidelines.

First-time contributor (0 prior PRs, 0% merge rate) with single-file XS PR. No comments, no human reviews, no approvals, no maintainer engagement. Greptile automated review is not a human reviewer engagement signal. Channel-specific fix (matrix media) lacks community validation or maintainer discussion. Absence of human engagement combined with first-time contributor status and zero prior merge history (P-1-4) predicts non-merge despite narrow scope. No positive signals override this compounded absence-of-engagement pattern.

XL-sized PR (21 files, labeled 'size: XL') from first-time contributor (0 prior PRs, 0% merge rate) with no human reviewer approval and only automated Greptile reviews identifying multiple unresolved technical issues. Multiple review cycles with greptile identifying handler unregistration, dispatcher reservation leaks, and incomplete path handling suggest substantive technical concerns remain unaddressed. Pattern P-1-4 applies: XL-sized PRs from first-time contributors without maintainer labels are unlikely to merge. Combined with Pattern P-4-1 (no human reviewer engagement despite concerns raised), this predicts non-merge.

First-time contributor andrewdamelio (0 prior PRs, 0% merge rate) with XS size (0 files reported but likely minimal scope). HenryLoenwind (CONTRIBUTOR, top contributor) approved after author addressed safety concerns ('Looks good now'). Author incorporated feedback iteratively (validateCwd approach). Greptile review present. Positive engagement from trusted contributor + responsiveness signal merge despite first-time status. Note: 0 files_changed seems data error; PR must have content.

Author carrotRakko has 0% merge rate (3 prior PRs, 0 merged). XS-sized, focused scope (1 file). Only greptile-apps automated review (no human reviewer engagement). Per Pattern P-5-8, first-time contributors with XS-sized PRs, only automated reviews, no human reviewer engagement, and 0% merge history are unlikely to merge. No maintainer label, no maintainer comment. Small scope cannot overcome 0% author history + no human engagement.

First-time contributor (0 prior PRs) with XS-sized PR. No human reviewer engagement beyond automated greptile review (which identified 1 comment, likely a concern). No approvals, no comments from humans, no maintainer label. Per P-5-7, first-time contributors with no human reviewer engagement and only automated reviews have low merge probability. Small scope doesn't overcome lack of human validation.
